item.title: Neverness to Everness ‘Co-Ex Test’ sign-ups now available
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Smartphone

Playable across PlayStation 5, PC, iOS, and Android.

Publisher Perfect World Games and developer Hotta Studio have opened sign-ups for the closed “Co-Ex Test” for free-to-play urban open-world action RPG Neverness to Everness, the companies announced. The test will be available across PlayStation 5, PC, iOS, and Android. It will support English, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Spanish, and Russian language options, with English, Japanese, Korean, and Chinese voice-overs.

Here is an overview of the game, via Perfect World Games:

About

Neverness to Everness is a supernatural open-world RPG developed by Hotta Studio. The story begins in the city of Hethereau, where you play as the first “unlicensed” Anomaly Hunter. You will join the antique shop Eibon, which relies on taking on Anomaly commissions from the public to stay afloat. Alongside your diverse and extraordinary partners, you’ll explore various urban mysteries, experiencing an array of adventures filled with laughter and tears, and crafting your unique urban saga.

Strange City, Strange Adventures

Welcome to the first stop in your appraisal career—Hethereau, a bustling and open metropolis!

In the bustling Bureau of Anomaly Control hall, hopeful Oddities queue up for their resident permits, while at the train station, an Esper commuter snaps his fingers to clean his work suit in a hurry. On one side of the street, a chaotic chase after Danzaburou is unfolding, while at the other end, a vacationing silver-gloved Butler chats amiably with the owner of a second-hand electronics shop. Everywhere you look, there’s an abundance of intriguingly “abnormal” scenes!

Want to delve deeper into this world where humans and the supernatural coexist? Start your journey in Hethereau to witness, experience, and document it firsthand! The lively and quirky daily life here is a grand adventure in itself.

Interesting Stories, Lighthearted Connections

  • Today’s Top Story – Rumors swirl about a mysterious pawnshop that only appears on the night of the full moon each month. What will you pledge for your wish?
  • Breaking News – Taygedo’s romance crisis! Romance and impulsiveness, heartbreak and missed opportunities! Miss Tako, the object of a secret crush, is about to move away from Hethereau with her guarantor. How will the lovestruck otter convey his feelings before it’s too late?
  • Reliable Insider Info – The photo studio “Film Orbit Studio” has reopened! All members of the Eibon Antique Shop enjoy exclusive discounts!
  • Weather Update – The Anomaly Rainman is entering an active phase, so be sure to carry rain gear when you go out~

That’s all for today’s “10AM” broadcast. Stay tuned for mysterious Anomalies, unbreakable “Oaths,” and the ever-growing shadow of the colossal “Circle” organization, becoming clearer in the fragmented echoes of “Prophecies”…

Encounters and Bonds

Explore the mysterious shops in secluded alleys, meet the enigmatic shop owners, the high powerlevel bodyguards, the “jack-of-all-trades” robotic butlers, the troublemakers who can’t stay out of problems, and the TV-headed repairmen with curious eating habits!

—As a member of Eibon, you’ll always have energetic companions on your lively adventures!

Expand your social map starting from the bustling Hankaku Street! Courageously meet more faction members and freely add them as “Bagel” friends!

From the harmonious neighborhood of street shops to the unique hunter organizations, countless tales await in the side stories, ready for you to gather friends and forge bonds far and wide!

Customize Your Urban Lifestyle

Freely explore your city, choosing familiar routines or daring to try new things!

Customize your car and speed through bustling streets to feel the city’s heartbeat, or take a ride on the Ghost Train to traverse Anomaly spaces and reach your destination in a flash.

In your downtime, will you visit the old shops on Hankaku Street to browse the secret seasonal goods, or will you purchase a cozy home and redecorate it to your liking?

Listen to your heart, follow your own pace, and immerse yourself in the vibrant city that embraces your trust, rewarding you with colorful, memorable days.

Neverness to Everness will be available for PlayStation 5, PC, iOS, and Android. A release date has yet to be announced.

item.title: Infinity Ward and Respawn Entertainment co-founder Vince Zampella killed in car crash
item.content:encoded:
Single-vehicle accident occurred on December 21.

Vince Zampella—the co-founder and former head of Infinity Ward, co-founder and head of Respawn Entertainment, and head of Ripple Effect Studios—died in a car crash on Southern California’s Angeles Crest Highway on December 21, according to an NBC4 Investigates report. He was 55 years old.

The single-vehicle accident was reported at about 12:45 p.m. The car veered off the road, hit a concrete barrier, and a passenger was ejected, according to the California Highway Patrol. The driver was trapped in the car fire and died at the scene, while the passenger died at the hospital.

Details about why the car veered off the road have yet to be determined.

Update 4:40 p.m.: Electronic Arts has provided Kotaku the following statement on Zampella’s death:

“This is an unimaginable loss, and our hearts are with Vince’s family, his loved ones, and all those touched by his work. Vince’s influence on the video game industry was profound and far-reaching. A friend, colleague, leader and visionary creator, his work helped shape modern interactive entertainment and inspired millions of players and developers around the world. His legacy will continue to shape how games are made and how players connect for generations to come.”
